attributes.action: national vocational qaulification for dementia carers
attributes.additional_details: Dementia patients are often cared for by carers  with no specific training in dementia.this is complex condition  ,and people with this are very vulnerable.A national   Compulsery Vocational training qaulification will help to standerise and improve care, also give relatives a little peace of mind that their relatives needs are met and understood, and help to improve services for people with dementia.
